rows.label: tlk41200123_03_msg0001
rows.name:
The other day at Twin Trunks Hill,
a bunch of Drivers were captured
by Superbian soldiers.

rows.label: tlk41200123_03_msg0002
rows.name:
They finally became Drivers, so why would
they do something bad like that...?

rows.label: tlk41200123_03_msg0003
rows.name:
There are people who want to be Drivers but can't...
Using a Blade for evil is unforgivable...
